articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: US Stock Futures Rise as China Trade Tensions Cool: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian equities headed for a record close as signs of easing trade frictions helped boost sentiment after recent volatility tied to concerns about US regional banks.
articles.content:
